name: Emissary Panda Malware SLLauncher
description: Detects the execution of DLL side-loading malware used by threat group Emissary Panda aka APT27
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*\\sllauncher.exe AND process.executable:*\\svchost.exe)`
